title: Freewheeling Podcast: Petition to remove uphill time trials from stage races
content:
Freewheeling Podcast: Petition to remove uphill time trials from stage races

The PowerPuff’s assemble to discuss the Ceratizit Challenge by La Vuelta. Do uphill time trials belong in stage races? Or would the general classification battle benefit more from a mountain top and a flat time trial? 

And finally, the women of Freewheeling have a PSA about respecting your fellow cyclists. 

In case you missed it, find Abby’s chat with Lizzie Deignan here.
